titleStmt.title: Virtue and valour vindicated or, The late hugh and cry sent after Generall Massie, Pointz, &c. retorted in the teeth of that scandalous libeller, who being ashamed to shew his name, hath discovered his nature. An enemy to honesty and all honour, and a living character of inhumanity. / By I.H.
titleStmt.author: I. H.

notesStmt.note: A reply to: A speedy hue and cry (Wing S4911).
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
